description: This file defines an InvoiceApi object that provides methods for interacting with an invoice backend API. It includes functions for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting invoices via HTTP requests.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches a list of invoices, optionally filtered by query parameters.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific invoice by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new invoice with the provided data.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing invoice identified by ID with the new data.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes an invoice by its ID.
